thread.title: BRIEF-Steinhoff Africa Retail Says Total Interest In Co Held By Ainsley Now Amounts To 71.01 Pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Steinhoff Africa Retail Says Total Interest In Co Held By Ainsley Now Amounts To 71.01 Pct

organizations.name: brief-steinhoff africa retail says total interest in co

text:
April 13 (Reuters) - Steinhoff Africa Retail Ltd:
* TOTAL INTEREST IN ORDINARY SHARES OF CO NOW HELD BY AINSLEY AMOUNTS TO 71.01% OF TOTAL ISSUED ORDINARY SHARE CAPITAL OF CO
* PARTICIPATION IN DISPOSAL PROCESS INCLUDED A BROAD SPREAD OF RETAIL, LONG-ONLY AND HEDGE FUND INVESTORS
* DISPOSAL OF SHARES IN STAR RESULTS IN STAR ACHIEVING MIN. FREE FLOAT OF 20% , EXPECTED TO ENHANCE LIQUIDITY IN STARâ€™S SHARES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
